verbose_text: The differentiation status of the EBs into neural lineages was monitored by the expression of SOX1, SOX3 and PAX6, markers of neuroectodermal differentiation XREF_BIBR, whereas the undifferentiated iPSCs were monitored by the expression of DNMT3B, REX1 and endogenous OCT4 which are assumed to be expressed in fully reprogrammed hiPSCs XREF_BIBR.
evidence: expression of DNMT3B, REX1 and endogenous OCT4
